contest-event.event-date:
July 4, 1896 D Rawmarsh Contest
Rawmarsh Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
rawmarsh-contest
None
Cricket Field, Rawmarsh 2nd annual contest promoted by Rawmarsh Prize band. Prizes: £10, £6, £3 7 bands entered, 3 competed. March contest: 1. Rotherham, 2. Grimesthorpe
April 29, 2012, 3:08 p.m. July 1, 2019, 8:17 p.m.
1 Rotherham Temperance Fenton Renshaw Rossini's Works
2 Sheffield Temperance John Davison Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
3 Grimesthorpe Joseph Brookes Meyerbeer's Works [unknown arranger]
